headline.print_headline: Longtime NBC News Anchor Tom Brokaw Diagnosed With Cancer
headline.main: Longtime NBC News Anchor Tom Brokaw Diagnosed With Cancer

lead_paragraph: Veteran news anchor Tom Brokaw, the face of "NBC Nightly News" for more than two decades, has been diagnosed with multiple myeloma, a cancer affecting blood cells in the bone marrow, but is hopeful about the outcome of his treatment, the network said on Tuesday.
